  B: day 2 and day 6
  C: day 3 and day 5

For example, we know that Himalayans cannot be featured on day 1, so we can eliminate answer choice A.
We also know that no breed can be featured on any two consecutive days, so we can eliminate answer choices C and E.
The correct answer is B because it is the only pair of days that violates the restriction that no breed can be featured on any two consecutive days.
